summary: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.
cast: Millie Perkins|Joseph Schildkraut|Shelley Winters|Richard Beymer|Gusti Huber|Lou Jacobi|Diane Baker|Douglas Spencer|Dodie Heath|Ed Wynn|Arthur Berkeley|Robert Boon|John Corrydon|Del Erickson|Gretchen Goertz|William Kirschner|Orangey|Edmund Purdom|Frank Tweddell|Charles Wagenheim|Bruce Walkup
title: El diario de Ana Frank
